text:
MOON GIRL: ♪ Ooh, my feet
touched the ground ♪

♪ Here I am world,
hear that trumpet sound? ♪

♪ And me and my girls
'bout to dip and slide ♪

♪ Ooh, honey boom,
cute, smart, and clever ♪

SINGERS:
♪ If you didn't know it ♪

MOON GIRL:
♪ Thought you knew, baby ♪

MOON GIRL:
♪ Thought you knew, baby ♪

Uh-uh-uh, where is
your silk bonnet, Lu?

You mean my silk nuts
and bolts holder? (chuckles)

it's time you took proper care
of your hair.

But that's what
I've got you for.
You know you love doing it.

Old enough to know that to love
your hair is to love yourself.
Oh, c'mon, Ma. It's just hair.

-The Lunella Wall of Fame.
-The Lunella Wall of Fame!

I look at this and remember
who you were in each moment.

Here, you were my curious,
curly-haired baby.

So when you take your school
picture in a few days,

these precious puffs
will help us remember

Well, right now, I'm the girl
who's gonna be late for school.

Hey, I may need an assist
on the lesson today.
Like, you may need to teach it.

Oh, you know, I got you,
Coach Hrbek.

Case! Since when are you
in this science class?

I just needed to consult
on my picture day outfit.

But I still don't get
all the fuss about picture day.

My mom went in on me about how
my hair looked this morning.

I mean, your hair always looks
messy like that.

Like how it stands
on end all frizzy.

But that's the look
you're going for, right?

Uh, maybe it wouldn't hurt
to try a new hairstyle
for picture day.

Lunella,
your hair is fly as it is.

Yeah, but I need
picture day fly, you know.

CASEY: For the record,
I love your natural hair.
Say hello to your brand-new do!

(scoffs) More like
"yo" to your bad fro!

Yeah, the curls are strong
with this one.

Maybe you should leave this
to the professionals...
Oh, no. My mama not having it.

She's scared of the chemicals
for some reason.

If only some super genius
could bioengineer

What do you mean
you have a bad feeling?

Ya girl got more silk
than a worm,

and she's gonna slay
picture day.

Go ahead, Devil,
tell me how cute I am.

I thought you weren't
gonna use harsh chemicals.

I made my all-natural
hair straightener,

but I supercharged it
and somehow

Just say you used
too much juice.
I used too much doggone juice.

Oh, Hey, Mom.
Yeah. We're fine.

like normal teen girlies
who aren't hiding anything!

It's so fun being a youth.
(exaggerated laughter)

Who gave you
that ridiculous lid?

The hat from our matching
Halloween costumes!

I knew you'd come around!
Should I get mine?

I'm gon--
I'm gonna get mine.
What is going on in here?

You know Lu, bald is not
a bad look on you.

Seriously,
it brings out your eyes!

Oh, my family cannot find out
about my hair.
Oh, my mom's gonna wig out.

Let's just say
I went through a wig phase.

Time to take my girl
for a test drive.
You won't catch me, Moon Girl!

I am the baddest
that's ever been, baby!

Rockin' Rudy's getting
away in that souped-up coupe!

My helmet doesn't fit right
with this slippery wig.
Not that I don't love it!

Are y'all coming
for these jewels or not?

I ain't gonna just
give em to you.

I'm running an analysis
on the hair I found as we speak.

I'll know who's behind
the sabotage

by the time my robot
takes first place.

why are you still
in my science class?

Don't worry,
I'm not learning anything.

Hey, your hair is...
pretty now.

Aw, thanks, girly,
but I prefer "fierce."

All right. All right.
Game day, people.

Oh, even I know
this isn't right.

And they used hair
to destroy my robot.

-I just need more time to--
-More time?

Can't believe I'm saying this,
but you're out!

According to your pocket thingy,
this is your hair.

Hey, you cookin' somethin',
baby girl?

Midnight snacking
runs in our family.

Why is that awful smell
coming from my kitchen?

Mimi, don't make her
feel bad.

Ooh, that Sheba
smells great, Lunella.

-Here, let me help you, child.
-(yawns) What ch'all doin'?

I'm getting a bowl of
that Sheba, 'cause I'm hungry.

I spent a lot of time
on my Sheba soup,
and I'd like to eat it alone...

Oh, so she can have
a whole pot of soup,

but when I don't want
to share my birthday cake,

Casey, so sorry
to bug you this late,
and they cut my wigs to shreds!

Oh, it's gonna take me
days to give each of them
I'll see you at picture day.

You always think
you'll have more time.

LUNELLA: Oh, I'm telling you, D,
the same person ruined

my robot, made you fall,
and destroyed Casey's wigs.

And we're gonna search every
warehouse, farmhouse, henhouse,

outhouse, and doghouse
in this city until I find--

Now I'm the baddest
super-villain there is.

trying to bio-engineer
a hair straightener.

Oh, wait, you already saw
that part.

Anyway,
she really is mad, y'all.

After you burned me and ripped
at me with a tiny comb!

You have to
use a wide-toothed comb

on naturally curly hair!
Who doesn't know that?

Well, Newton never
mentioned wide-toothed combs!

Sorry? You tried to get
rid of me!

Replaced me with some
cheap wig that doesn't even

You just decided out of the blue
that I wasn't good enough.

MANE: Be quiet!
Answer the question!
You turned me into a monster.

Now, I'll take your compound
and make monsters of my own.

My hair minions and I
will destroy this city!

Your two-ton vat
is ruining my evil exit!

You really
are the worst, Moon Girl.

Oh, my baby's head.
It's bald.

(crying)
There was this jerk in class...

and I felt unpretty,
and then I supercharged

the amino acids
and now I look like this!

Sweetheart,
we live in a society

that's never valued
our natural hair.

People tend to criticize
what they don't understand,

so they tell us
our natural hair is sloppy,

Our hair is versatile,
textured, beautiful,

It reflects our culture,
who we are

Hmm. Someone at school
said my Afro puffs looked messy.

And when we believe
those lies and start to feel

insecure about how we look,
that's when the trouble starts.
That's how it started for me.

I wanted my hair straight
so badly,

but regular heat wouldn't
get it straight enough.

So I made
that hot comb extra hot.

What I did
to my hair was even worse.
I gave myself a home relaxer,

but I skipped
an important step.

So that's why you're afraid
of relaxers!
Wait, what step did you skip?

It's a liquid
that you put in your hair

to make the chemical
in the relaxer stop working.

Oh, that's it!
I didn't make a neutralizer!

Your real mistake
was letting other people

make you feel bad
about yourself.

Always be proud
of who you are, little girl,

no matter what
the world tells you.

And remember, Lunella,
if you want your hair

to be good to you,
you've got to be good to it.

Because to love your hair
is to love yourself.
I've got to go stop Mane.

and start taking
better care of my hair.

I reversed the electrostatic
attraction between

the oppositely charged ions
in my original compound!

♪ I made a neutralizer
'cause I'm dope ♪

Now, all we gotta do
is find Mane's hideout,

spray her with this juice,
and she goes back

to being a big old,
normal hairball.

Remember, a sneak attack
is our best chance,

so I'll go in here,
you go in through the alley.
You were supposed to sneak in!
You jammed a dryer full of hair

and brought it to life
with my compound?

I needed a sidekick
to laugh at my jokes.

Which he would
if he understood them,

He and I together
will destroy--oh, man.

Your sidekick
was no match for Devil.
And you're no match for me.

SINGER:
♪ Can't find my way, no ♪

SINGER: ♪ I feel like
I'm stuck in a trap ♪

♪ Stuck in a city,
ain't no pity where I'm at ♪

♪ No GPS,
but I'm still on the map ♪

♪ Curve y'all a curveball,
I'm still up tp bat ♪

♪ Put the world at my back,
I'm a globetrotter ♪

♪ Know my place on the stage
'cause my flow hotter ♪

♪ I gotta find my direction,
put my goals in perspective ♪

♪ I'm en route to connection,
feeling like a detective ♪
♪ I'm in search for the clue ♪

♪ I'm in search of the glue,
from the concrete I grew ♪

♪ Just like a rose
when the scene changed ♪

♪ I'm just trying
to find my way ♪
♪ This is all I can say ♪

SINGER: ♪ I'm lost
and I can't see, no ♪

If there's one thing I can do,
it's bob and weave.
But what did-- what did he say?

and I'm going to be here
forever fighting myself.

Always be proud
of who you are, little girl,

because to love your hair
is to love yourself.

I don't want to fight
you anymore, Mane,
because you're a part of me.

I was a part of you
until you ruined it.

Actually, you were one
of the best parts!
My hair helped make me, me!
You never took care of me!

You never gave
a hair flip about me!

I didn't know I could lose you
until you were gone.

I'm not falling
for your trickery, Moon Girl!

When that girl made
fun of me, I felt ashamed.

That's why I made
the stupid compound.

But when I wore
that straight hair,

(scoffs)
I miss how my curls bounced,

and how my hair fits
perfectly inside my helmet.

My signature style makes me
look adorable

and manages to stay on point
no matter how fast I skate!

(sighs) I miss
all of that, Mane...

♪ I'm moving
on a whole 'nother level ♪
♪ Gotta catch up to my speed ♪
♪ You ain't gotta gas me up ♪

♪ I never leave my tank
on E ♪

♪ I look at myself
in the mirror ♪
♪ I'll tell you what I see ♪

♪ Beautiful brown
with a big 'ol smile ♪

♪ I'm coming in strong,
and I'm wearing it proud ♪

MANE: Be good to me, Lunella,
and I'll be good to you!

♪ I could wear it curly
in the spring and the summer ♪

♪ I can brush it down,
or I could wear it loud, wow ♪

♪ I love myself,
I love my hair ♪

♪ Said, I love myself,
I love my hair ♪

Still can't believe you made
an instant hair growth serum!

Now, that's some
Black Girl Magic.
Don't y'all stay up too late.

Sorry I missed all sixty-seven
of your wig funerals.

-You okay?
-It was time to let them go.

And besides,
at least I still have Sheba.
Where is she, by the way?
